timeline.message: #33 - fixed artipie server and config parsing

timeline.bodyText:
@g4s8 Would be smarter to assign uri.getPath() to a variable once after line 74  and use it.
This method response defines uri.getPath() twice.

replies.bodyText: @fanifieiev I checked it on JDK13 and it's working fine, you may want to submit a ticket with proposal for update, but I don't think we need to do it right now
